article.headline: MICHIGAN 65, MISSOURI 64
article.story: COLUMBIA, Mo. (AP) -- Linas Kleiza had 23 points and nine rebounds to lead Missouri to a 90-60 exhibition victory over Northwest Missouri State on Wednesday night. Missouri led 52-39 at halftime and extended its lead to as many as 31 points in the second half. Four Tigers scored in double figures, including Thomas Gardner, who had 19 points. Austin Meyer led the Bearcats, the No. 12 team in Division II, with 14 points. Missouri opens the regular season Monday against Brown in the Guardians Classic.
